website_summaries.verdict: It's hard to beat the Jabra Supreme's strong noise canceling and voice command features. If you're willing to pay a premium and don't mind the design or lack of stereo audio, the Supreme may have your name on it.
pros: The Jabra Supreme offers powerful active noise canceling, plenty of volume, and advanced voice controls
cons: The Supreme's ear loop is large and has a loose fit
You may have to perform a software upgrade

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily - No Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Great product sound-wise. They tend to break on or near the arm swivel point. I have bought two and one broke shortly after the warranty and the other broke in 4 months. [UPDATE 4/12/19] I notified Jabra about my issue over one month ago, completed their Warranty Information on their web site for incident CS00403762. I have since emailed them twice and no response. My conclusion is that Jabra doesn't give one iota about standing by their product. Vendors like this deserve to go out of business. I will *Never* buy from Jabra again.
customer_reviews.author: Stu Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this headset
customer_reviews.text: "In the ear" headsets have not been loud enough for me recently. I think it's because of Bluetooth version 4. I think they lowered max volume so people wouldn't harm their hearing [like we aren't responsible enough to do that on our own!] This ear piece sits over the ear not in it. As a result I can hear extremely well! Nobody can tell I'm speaking on it in a call. Calls are very clear and I have had no complaints from callers either. Its very classy looking and very light, which I have had to get used to. Hard to remember you have it on! Absolutely LOVE this headset!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Homstad

customer_reviews.title: Screws up all the time
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work with my flip-phone, so Jabra was good enough to replace it...with a 2nd one that didn't work. Then I got an LG G3 smartphone and it worked fine with that- for about a month. Now it refuses to connect about 1/3 of the time and constantly screws up. The voice commands won't work, or I can't get it to connect at all. It's way to dangerous to ever try to use it in a car again. I am very disappointed with Jabra, I always heard they were the best. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Light-weight and Surprisingly Durable Headset
customer_reviews.text: A light-weight, very comfortable headset. It mated with my Samsung Galaxy Note II quickly and without issue. The sound quality is more than adequate. This headset is also surprisingly durable. I accidentally left it in the lower pocket of my cargo-style shorts when they went through the wash. I removed the plastic earpieces, shot Dust Off into the audio speaker opening, put the headset in a small sealed baggie atop a handful of rice in a warm spot overnight, and then removed it from the baggie to hook up to the recharger. Once it was fully charged it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kirkes

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset for SOme oune with Hearing Aids
customer_reviews.text: The Jabra Supreme head set is fantastic. This is my third one over the last 5 years ( Lost one and like to keep two around). I wear in the canal hearing aids so I cannot use the ear but type headset. This fits over the ear and provides excellent sound quality and also blocks out wind and outside noises.
customer_reviews.author: DaveFL

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Like many other people I've now tried several Bluetooth headsets. I've now bought three of these: one for myself and two for gifts. I use an iPhone 4, and people say they can hear me BETTER with the Jabra device than when using the phone. And I can definitely hear them better. The noise reduction systems really work. I really couldn't be happier with this device. (I wish I could say the same for the Bluetooth reliability on my iPhone!!! If you try to pair this device on an iPhone, iOS-7 most-definitely works better than iOS-6, which is notoriously sketchy and received lots of "thumbs down" from Bluetooth users!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Insyte

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: the battery life is about 4 hours if that for all that money im disappointed had to walk with charger the fit isgood and a love the design the voice quality is ok but could be better and louder
customer_reviews.author: dizzkid

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed had bigger expectations
customer_reviews.text: Plus is: Easy pairing. Light weight. No svetting. Calls out callers name. Sits outside your ear. You answer or ignore calls with voice commands. Negative is. Talk time is short 4-5 hours after full charge. To much static ( this one might be defective) Sometimes disconnects and reconnects automatically Not the best noise canceling Again I might have gotten a defective one cause before I purchased I had heard great things about the Jabra Supreme
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good professional product
customer_reviews.text: Good professional product. I use this for making calls from home for personal and work calls. Everyone I have talked to about the call quality says they can't tell I am using a headset. I used to get complaints when using my previous headsets so this is what I was looking for. My only issue is it doesn't fit my ear well and I can't get it to fit tightly to my ear, causing everyone to sound quiet to me. I just ordered the wrap around head set attachment to hopefully alleviate the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect noise canceling, perfect voice Clarity
customer_reviews.text: The only dislike is that it is hard to find this product. My brother is an ac tech and this ear piece is the best we have found for him. Good fit. The only problem is from opening and closing it breaks at the bend.
customer_reviews.author: callie

customer_reviews.title: It's nice when your purchase is better than you hoped
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased another product and paid more. Needless to say, that lead me to purchase the Jabra SUPREME. Couldn't be happier! It connects to both my work iPhone and my personal Android phone and easily answers calls from one phone while talking on the other with no issues. Listeners have said they hear me better than when I'm talking straight into the phone and the only slight wind noise was while driving with all windows down, yet they were able to hear me fine.
customer_reviews.author: JimE Walker

customer_reviews.title: Jabra still makes the best Bluetooth headsets--well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, my third Jabra...better than ever! I've had two Jabra headsets in the past, along with one Samsung. The Samsung was awful, didn't hold signal well more than a few feet from the phone. My first Jabra took a trip through the washer in a shirt pocket, but the warranty was honored, no questions asked. Second worked great but flew out of my ear one day outside and was lost. This one is a bit bigger, but stronger signal--I can literally be anywhere in the house, even downstairs, and still reach the phone. Signal is awesome, excellent noise suppression. It's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: James W. Reider

customer_reviews.title: The best product that I've ever purchased that is great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best headset that anyone has ever made please buy one and try it it is so easy to use and it's so comfortable on your ears
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rashad

customer_reviews.title: Jaba SUPREME headset
customer_reviews.text: After putting my previous headset through the washing machine, I purchased the Jaba. Some of the reviews showed that the unit fit rather loosely so I was a bit concerned. No problem thought after taking a couple of minutes to read the instructions and adjust the ear piece up and down a bit I now have a comfortable and secure fit. The button on the mic arm does take a bit of getting use to, I tend to use the larger side button. A "Neat" feature is the function where the headset tells you who is calling and then asks if you want to "accept or ignore"
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Puberphonia Headset ?
customer_reviews.text: this is not the first Jabra headset i purchased, but this is worst headset i ever use. I am a business person and i am on the phone a lot. After a certain period on a call, person on the other side will tell me that my voice become robotic great feature, Jabra
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Stunning design...Wind cancellation it's phenomenal and when I talk with another persons, they can here me very loud and clear..Also I have an app on my phone which aloud me to do couple more settings..I charge the headset in approx 1 hour and the talk time remaining when the headset was full charged was 5 hours and 30 minutes. No ac adapter in this kit , just USB cable. Very comfortable...I can have on my all day long this Jabra and can I say it's a pleasure. My sun glasses fit perfect ! Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Quality but....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, great features but big and awkward. I would only wear them in my office and car but not my walk around every headset. Updated: After using this headset for a while (a few days), they really do grow on you and the size is not as big as I first thought. The voice quality is really amazing and that has lead me to wear them daily all the time. Very impressive. ABM
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: Durable and works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is a farmer. He is always outside in windy conditions as well as on a noisy tractor. I can understand him when he talks and his voice is very clear. Now he says he will buy me one because he doesn't like the hands-free system in my car. He said isn't not as clear as his new headset!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this headset....
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Jabra Supreme I have bought, the first was amazing, and lasted over 2 years before it would not hold a charge, and this is where the problem started. The new headset started out fine, but now 2 months later, no one can understand me, it is beyond worthless. I just tried a cheap 9.99 headset and everyone I called said it was night and day better! This headset cost me $75 two months ago, and now I can't even get Jabra to return an email. These units USED to be good, but not any more, save yourself the expense and pain, DO NOT buy this headset.
customer_reviews.author: NCSTec

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using one in car and one at home for about 4 years. It is the best set I have used. It can be hung on your ear with one hand. Very lightweight and comfortable. People you are talking to will think you are in your living room the noise cancelling is so good. Great sound quality on receiving end. Very good volume, I usually run at 50-75% volume.
customer_reviews.author: Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and voice
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound and voice. Not totally comfortable to wear as tends to feel as if it is falling off of the ear. Would not hesitate to replace with same if lost or broken. Prior style was ear insert which at times was very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst headset I have ever owned. My computer freezes whenever I try to switch from this headset to regular speakers. Also, when it works, people can hear me very well but I hear about 80% of what they say. Last but not least, sometimes I get muted without a way to unmute myself. I have owned other headsets and had never had issues like this.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome range
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth device works great and I’m able to leave my phone charging in the truck and still be able to talk and do my pre-trip and not loose the call.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as truck stop headsets
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these at a truck stop , best headset I ever owned, lost it so I got one from Amazon this is not the same my battery don't last and people have a hard time hearing me very disappointed in the head set wouldn't buy one again from Amazon Plus nothing came with it like my first one, it came with a head band and all kinds of extras this one did not!
customer_reviews.author: Viva Richerson

customer_reviews.title: Finally after 10yrs of search, i found something which works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying out various different bluetooth headsets from last 10yrs, Blueant Q2, Jawbone Era, Plantronics etc etc... And finally i stumble upon this one. This one fits my ear perfectly and has good noise reduction capabilities (of course i don't think it can eliminate completely). Others used to give me pain after wearing it for few mins, but this one i have been wearing it for hours and no pain!!! I even forget sometimes that it is hanging on to my ear :-)
customer_reviews.author: Vj

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on my laptop
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to get my HP 8440p laptop (Windows 7 Professional) to recognize this device. All the drivers auto-installed without errors, and when I turn it on it shows up as a bluetooth device, but it doesn't show up as a communication, speaker, or recording device. My existing bluetooth Jabra headset with a fixed base unit works fine, but this new portable headset does not. Kind of a deal-breaker since I need something for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blue Tooth Headpiece
customer_reviews.text: I previously used the Jawbone ERA, but after losing it, decided on something that wasn't sitting inside my ear. I use my cell as my primary phone. This is comfortable enough to use all day long. Only drawback is answering incoming calls if it is turned off (I am sure there is a trick I haven't figured out. I mainly use it for conference calls which works great). I gave it 5 stars because even with a few small drawbacks, it is by far the best one on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: great headset
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. I have had this headset since May and it has worked quite well with my Samsung Galaxy S4. the only thing I can pick on is the voice dial on the headset does not work for me. every time I say battery, it thinks I said Pairing and goes into pairing mode. so I just don't use that feature. I do like the annunciation of who is calling. and the clarity seems very good. when I use voice to text it is right on.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Over all its a great blue tooth. The head set function is great while driving or walking however the ear piece function that goes around the ear to hold the blue tooth in place is not stable and keeps falling off the ear. Besides that its a great product if you like using the head set feature instead.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life sucks works about four hours! But hearing is great I can understand and hear. I used myself and then My husband who is an OTR trucker, works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Great head set if you wear heating aids and have an android phone
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ann

customer_reviews.title: Bought for business, but unusable.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying top of the line with this earset, but I am constantly having people tell me it is cutting out, or sounds robotic and unclear. Amazon says I am past the return and support window, so I suppose I will have to throw it away and try a Plantronics unit next.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Finn

customer_reviews.title: It lays on your ear not in it
customer_reviews.text: The best ear piece thus far for talk not the great bass sound with music. But talking gets 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: KILLER SOUND QUALITY! EXCELLENT VALUE! I would buy this again. I was ready to spend more for a different Jabra. Called the company to discuss, and the rep there told me to go to amazon and buy this model. VERY HAPPY with both the item, and with Jabra's customer service in guiding me to a very suitable unit that was less expensive, but had all the capabilities I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice earbud
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she loves it! Make sure you buy the one that you can control via PC because it comes with a very nice case. Syncs perfectly and the sound is incredible. Holds a very long charge. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and sound is superb
customer_reviews.text: Works great and sound is superb. Very light, surprised me as to how good it is...I had a Jabra Motion style, but this is actually more comfortable and does not go in the ear...I actually had to turn down the volume and it stays put on my ear..a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: SPINNERBUG

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product
customer_reviews.text: First of all it the new jabra Supreme Plus . So it does have wind protection ( voice isolation ) and noise cancellation. The product chrome finishing is not good but it's not bad either . I bought it for my father whose not a tech guy but maganed to pair it easily with his two phones ( both iPhones ) . The sound quality is good on both end . I am giving it four star because I didn't like the chrome finish , everything else is good .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. Easy to put on and remove. Although, with time, the swing arm hinge breaks with what I believe is constantly putting on and taking off my ear. My third one in the last 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvester Martinez

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: love it.. however I am selling to a friend so I can buy the jabra stealth... I need one that has message readout.. I would have known that if the jabra web site was better about sharing features easily and if they had a comparison feature..
customer_reviews.author: BLSD

customer_reviews.title: I got a supreme jabra refurbished it's not working good. I could hear the caller but the caller ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a supreme jabra refurbished it's not working good . I could hear the caller but the caller can't hear me that's the only problem I incurred . Probably if I got a new one , it will be great .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic I love this
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bluetooth. You can actually hear when the sound is reduced when a phone call comes in. Very very comfortable comes with leftover right ear piece. Comes with to cushion cut pieces one in year one out I like the in ear it feels more like its holding like I said awesome piece
customer_reviews.author: maridog4

customer_reviews.title: My Bluetooth is difficult hear
customer_reviews.text: My Bluetooth sound cannot be increased, I'm founding it difficult to increase the volume. The sound was ok for about three to four months but now I don't know what happened the sound is too low to hear nother said, Can I have replacement ? Pls
customer_reviews.author: ISAAC NYAME

customer_reviews.title: we have had good luck with this headset
customer_reviews.text: we have had good luck with this headset, clarity and noise reduction works well. the only problem we have is they don't wash well, lol. have ordered several of them
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Stocks

customer_reviews.title: Matching up phone
customer_reviews.text: Used it for work purposes when I’m at work. So, I don’t have to walk around holding any phone. Instead I can say hello or touch a button and I’m talking handsfree
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor receive quality and poor quality of voice to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome. Poor receive quality and poor quality of voice to the listener. You are much better off getting the Blue Tiger Elite. I returned this one and got that one. Blue Tiger elite is 10X better quality. This looks much more sleek...but not great quality...too much noise.
customer_reviews.author: JAMMER1965

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST BLUETOOTH HEADSET EVER
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST BLUETOOTH HEADSET EVER!! Use on either ear, converts to regular ear set with ease. Quality and dependability are great. Well pleased and would buy for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for hands free cell phone calls
customer_reviews.text: I wear this at work and I work in my vehicle all day. It is a great way to answer and make cell phone calls without using your hands. on the phone. I can usually get through 2 whole days without a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love it because it doesn't go into my ear like all the ear buds. Also it turns off when closed which saves battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kori K. Estum

customer_reviews.title: No bad ideas
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought and it again does not work. Has a bad static on receivers in does not hold a charge when turned auto voice does not work which just simple commands can I get this product again handles for 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Nathan brewer

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life and comfortable fit. It does not feel like it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life and comfortable fit. It does not feel like it is in your ear or that you are you are doing even using a Bluetooth device. Clear, sharp, and hands free calling. It costs a pretty penny but it is worth every bit of money spent.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: The Best BT Headset I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: The best BT headset bar none. Sound is clear on both ends of the call and noise canceling works better than my Bose BT headset.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: 😍
customer_reviews.text: Love it Although it is big and sometimes falls off when I bend down or turn my head
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and noise cancelling!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and I can hear and be heard crystal clear! I hate having earphones in my ear and this is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shari_C

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well but sometimes comes loose from my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Garry B

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little loose
customer_reviews.text: The ear piece by itself fits a little loose and I had a hard time keeping it on my ear. The over the head piece fits better but I didn't want to always have to wear it especially when I'm going into shops or out to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great device.
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth is comfortable yet fits snug on your ear. I bought this b/c I have tragus piercings and it is uncomfortable to stick anything in my ear. It has great volume and my calls are clear. So worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Beuthien

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Fit is somewhat awkward in that it is not that tight on the ear. If vigorously walking it bounces around somewhat - maybe its just my ear. Maybe this is another example where it would have been nice to try on first....however even at retail its in a package. My biggest complaint is that the max volume still isnt loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stogsdill

customer_reviews.title: EAR HOOK
customer_reviews.text: I do like the item, BUT the ear hook is flimsy, doesn't feel secure on ear at all..
customer_reviews.author: Patti Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Jabra Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Like that it sat on the ear but the bulk caused it to flop too much. I had to turn the volume all the way up just to hear. Device would continuously disconnect and reconnect between the two paired devices. Others would complain they couldn't hear me half the time.
customer_reviews.author: runsforchampagne

customer_reviews.title: horrible. returned it for
customer_reviews.text: i kept turning off when it rang . horrible. returned it for planatronics
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Works great, connects good and has available apps to tweek ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, connects good and has available apps to tweek it on the play store. The only thing that I would improve is the size, this is pretty large, kind of like a golf ball in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Chef JH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good expensive headset.
customer_reviews.text: Connectivity issues occur, during initial pair, but not every time. Sound quality is amazing on both ends. def. worth the money. I had cheaper ones before and its all garbage. Jabra does make very nice products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Is a computer!
customer_reviews.text: Is like Siri. You can say re-dial, and many other commands. Is a great thing when you travel or when you use it at office. Great quality of sound (said by the people that I conference with). The best I've ever had (40 or 50 USD average).
customer_reviews.author: Henry L.

customer_reviews.title: The ear piece holder comes off of the base every ...
customer_reviews.text: The ear piece holder comes off of the base every time I put it on, this is the 2nd Jabra that I've owned and the first one did not have this problem. I would not buy another one based on this one purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Barron

customer_reviews.title: Works well when on the phone, clear and crisp ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well when on the phone, clear and crisp, Command prompts sometimes take several attempts, probably don't speak the language where it was manufactured! lol
customer_reviews.author: maddog7shooter

customer_reviews.title: The Best Blue Tooth EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is it! So much better then any other blue tooth I have had in the past. I forget that it is on. My co-worker asked if it bothered me to wear my blue tooth all day and I did not even realize I was wearing it!
customer_reviews.author: sherriemyers

customer_reviews.title: Using this with my Office Phone
customer_reviews.text: Okay, have been through several bluetooth cheapo headsets with my home office phone. This one is soooo much better, more clear, just all around better. The voice controls don't work with my phone, but I don't care about that. But you can press a button and ask how much battery is left - pretty cool. It is very intuitive and looks great as well. Very comfortable with the over the head hardware that came with it (also two sets of over the ear came with it as well). Recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Fredric R Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!
customer_reviews.text: I have got it very fast and in original pack. It is very easy to sync with my Galaxy S5, great sound and very light weight. I use it in my job, all day around and the batteries keep doing the job. I certainly would recomend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD PRODUCT, NOT HEAVY, LONG LIFE BATTERY, AND GOOD VOLUMEN
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Arnaldo Perez Guzman

customer_reviews.title: AS A TRUCK DRIVER THIS IS BAR-NONE THEEEE BEST BLUETOOTH HEADSET I EVER BOUGHT
customer_reviews.text: AS A TRUCK DRIVER THIS IS BAR-NONE THEEEE BEST BLUETOOTH HEADSET I EVER BOUGHT. Been through the others you get at truck stops. The blue parrot was annoying, with the bright blue flashing light illuminating the whole can at night, ear piece broke on that one, the road king 3 mouthpiece stopped working, nobody could hear me anymore after six months, the cobra I bought through Internet, ear piece broke on that one too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Using this now for around 3 month. No complaints ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this now for around 3 month. No complaints. Even when I'm a little far from my phone and behind some walls, I still don't lose the quality. It's lightweight and it's really compact when microphone is in closed position
customer_reviews.author: mjclk

customer_reviews.title: Why cant she be heard by callers
customer_reviews.text: Worked great while it worked, but not even a user later, my wife can't be heard on the other end by her callers. She is totally bummed out. She loved it at the beginning
customer_reviews.author: Donk

customer_reviews.title: but the quality and comfort were great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a buy for my mother-in-law, who constantly complained about weak headsets that would fall apart. I know Jabra is a legitimate brand, and made the recommendation. I only tested it for a few calls, but the quality and comfort were great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Davie

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bluetooth Panasonic phone so maybe it would be better with mobile. Not usable with my new Panasonic phone. Has to be manually reconnected to my after every charge. Last night i didn't have to recharge but it still disconnected from the phone and had to be manually reconnected. Can't answer calls with voice or the answer button. It now has stopped ending calls. The only voice command it recognizes is 'phone commands' which gives you the ability to dial a call on your phone. I'm going back to a Blue Parrot. That seemed to work well with the Panasonic. Just was very large and heavy so ordered the smaller version of the parrot.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Boone

customer_reviews.title: terrible audio quality about half of the time
customer_reviews.text: terrible audio quality about half of the time. people haven't compained about hearing me, but it's pretty bad on my end.
customer_reviews.author: notatoyatall

customer_reviews.title: Great home headset
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset when working from my home office. I pair it with my ooma home phone or my iphone. I have to jump through weird wonky hoops to get it to pair with the ooma phone (a limitation of the ooma -not this headset). But, it's great. I wish it had better range - I need to keep within 15 feet before it loses connection. I really like the voice activated commands.
customer_reviews.author: LesleyA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've had many different Bluetooth models and brands before but this one by far is the best one that I've ever owned. Crystal clear to me and everyone hears me clearly also. I love being able to hear everything that plays through my phone out of the Bluetooth also!
customer_reviews.author: P. Orta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great for noisy locations
customer_reviews.text: I drive a truck for a living and this set is great. Very comfortable to wear. Volume is more than adequate over engine noise. Noise cancelling is so good, people I call don't even know I'm moving.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bluetooth!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great but having issues with it turning on and off reliably when it it supposed to. I like the software interface that goes on the phone to control the settings and give status of connection and battery life. It is a little big when folded up. Great price in Amazon, especially with the incentive when applying for an Amazon Visa. Would have really liked to have an extended warranty but did not see one offered.

product_meta.title: Jabra SUPREME Bluetooth Headset - Retail Packaging - Black
product_meta.description: Style:SupremeYour Space. Your Sound With Active Noise Cancellation. Experience your own space filled only with your sound. Active Noise Cancellation technology creates an unprecedented sound experience, and Jabra SUPREME is the first Bluetooth mono headset to allow you to enjoy this exceptional feature. It works by actively reducing the background noise, enhancing your listening experience during a call. Jabra SUPREME features the latest audio enhancement technology, delivering powerful sound through its 24mm speaker. With HD Voice the sound comes through clearly and naturally. Wind-noise reduction technology makes calling in windy weather conditions smooth and hassle-free. These brilliant sound features enrich every conversation. Jabra SUPREME unites design and usability with its patented Flip-Boom arm. Simply unfold the arm to switch ON and fold to switch OFF. When not in use, it folds to pocket size for easy storing. Jabra SUPREME also delivers custom comfort for all ears, by letting you adjust the headset to achieve the best fit and placement according to your needs. It includes two interchangeable soft ear cushions, to suit every ear shape. Its bendable ear hook is easily adjustable and its on-the-ear shape sits securely in place ensuring maximum comfort for all day usage. This revolutionary headset includes convenient features such as Voice Guidance and Voice Control, making it effortless to benefit from hands-free conversations. Jabra SUPREME also gives you access to all your favorite media with A2DP, which streams it effortlessly to your headset. Supreme sound and supreme comfort everything you need in one superior device.
feature_bullets: Active Noise Cancellation technology removes background noise so the headset user hear a clear conversation
Noise Blackout 3.0 dual microphone technology and wind-noise reduction technology allows the user to be heard clearly by the person they are talking to
Voice Control allows the user to answer or ignore calls by using simple voice commands and Voice Guidance provides spoken caller ID, battery level and connection status
Multiuse connects to 2 Bluetooth devices at the same time
HD Voice technology for exceptional sound quality. Supported Bluetooth profiles A2DP (v1.2), hands free profile (v1.6), headset profile (v1.1), PBAP

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars592 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
